articles.description: All the latest football news as Premier League returns, manager news conferences and women's transfer deadline day approaches
articles.title: Football latest news live: Premier League returns

articles.description: McLaren are to prioritise Lando Norris over team-mate Oscar Piastri in their bid to win both Formula 1 world championships this year, team principal Andrea Stella tells BBC Sport.
articles.title: McLaren ask Oscar Piastri to back Lando Norris F1 title bid

articles.description: Arne Slot has managed something at Liverpool that Jurgen Klopp achieved only once in eight seasons. But how do they compare?
articles.title: Liverpool: Arne Slot v Jurgen Klopp - how they compare

articles.description: The Solheim Cup is a revolutionary tournament born out of the success of a revolutionary putter.
articles.title: Solheim Cup: How a revolutionary club sparked a golf revolution

articles.description: Twenty years after becoming the youngest player to feature in an FA Cup final, Curtis Weston is playing in the competition for non-league Mickleover.
articles.title: FA Cup: Curtis Weston still playing 20 years after featuring in 2004 final

articles.description: Australia will be competitive against the British and Irish Lions in 2025 despite poor recent results, says Rugby Australia chief Phil Waugh.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Wallabies will be ready for 2025 - Waugh

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta agrees a new three-year contract, which will keep him at the club until 2027.
articles.title: Mikel Arteta: Arsenal boss agrees new contract until 2027

articles.description: Tottenham midfielder Rodrigo Bentancur is charged by the FA for using a racial slur about team-mate Son Heung-min.
articles.title: Rodrigo Bentancur charged by FA over racial slur about Son Heung-min

articles.description: Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez wants to show everybody he is still the best when he faces Edgar Berlanga in Las Vegas on Saturday.
articles.title: Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez vs Edgar Berlanga: Mexican out to prove he is 'still the best'

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo says Manchester United must "rebuild everything" in order to compete for the biggest prizes in club football again.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Forward questions mentality of Man Utd boss Erik ten Hag and calls for 'rebuild'
